1.title: When Harry Met Annie
1.plot: Avery and Sid take a "mini-vaca" for two days leaving Jack alone to run the theatre. But all hell breaks loose when Celia and Stacey ban Jack from rehearsals, and make a few minor changes to "Annie". Just a few...

1.title: The Overture
1.plot: The beginning of the end of Jack and Avery Matthews, after they move from NYC to LA to be in a sitcom that gets canceled after only a few episodes. Out of work and out of money, they are conned into running a children's theatre company by their agent, who is also their best friend.

2.title: The Callbacks
2.plot: The new hires, Spiro and Celia Saks, old college theatre friends of Jack, Avery and Sid, begin running a muck as callbacks for Annie are underway. But the real chaos begins when Stacey, Sam's mother/father, and Sid's Ex, decides to make Sam audition for the part of Annie, but then shows the kids how it's done.

1.title: The Cast List

imdb.plot outline: Episode 1 The beginning of the end for Jack and Avery Matthews after they move to LA from New York to be in a sitcom that gets canceled after only a few episodes. Out of work and out of money, they are conned into running a Children's Theatre company by their agent who is also their best friend, and Avery's ex. Episode 2 The new hires, Spiro and Celia Saks, old college theatre friends of Jack, Avery and Sid, begin running a muck as callbacks for Annie are underway. But the real chaos begins when Stacey, Sam's and Sid's ex, decides to make Sam audition for the part of Annie but then shows the kids how it's done. Episode 3 Spiro Saks is ready to post the cast list for Annie, but not without protest from the kids, who, needless to say, did not get the parts they wanted. Episode 4 Avery and Sid take a "mini-vaca" for two days leaving Jack alone to run the theatre. But all hell breaks loose when Celia and Stacey ban Jack from rehearsals, and make a few minor changes to "Annie". Just a few....
